00377    /*
00378    * Copy constructor
00379    */
00380    inline
00381    Tensor::Tensor(const Tensor& t)
00382    {
00383       for (int i = 0; i < DimensionSq; ++i) {
00384          elem_[i] = t.elem_[i];
00385       }
00386    }
00387 
00388    /*
00389    * Constructor, initialize all elements to a scalar value.
00390    */
00391    inline
00392    Tensor::Tensor(double scalar)
00393    {
00394       for (int i = 0; i < DimensionSq; ++i) {
00395          elem_[i] = scalar;
00396       }
00397    }
00398 
00399    /*
00400    * Construct Tensor from C double [][Dimension] array.
00401    */
00402    inline
00403    Tensor::Tensor(const double a[][Dimension])
00404    {
00405       for (int i = 0; i < Dimension; ++i) {
00406          for (int j = 0; j < Dimension; ++j) {
00407             elem_[i*Dimension + j] = a[i][j];
00408          }
00409       }
00410    }
00411 
00412    /*
00413    * Set all elements of this tensor to zero.
00414    */
00415    inline
00416    Tensor& Tensor::zero()
00417    {
00418       for (int i = 0; i < DimensionSq; ++i) {
00419          elem_[i] = 0.0;
00420       }
00421       return *this;
00422    }

00431          elem_[i] = t.elem_[i];
00432       }
00433       return *this;
00434    }

00436    /*
00437    * Assignment from C double [][Dimension] array.
00438    */
00439    inline
00440    Tensor& Tensor::operator=(const double a[][Dimension])
00441    {
00442       int i, j;
00443       for (i = 0; i < Dimension; ++i) {
00444          for (j = 0; j < Dimension; ++j) {
00445             elem_[i*Dimension + j] = a[i][j];
00446          }
00447       }
00448       return *this;
00449    }

00452    * Add tensor dt to this tensor.
00453    */
00454    inline
00455    void Tensor::operator+=(const Tensor& dt)
00456    {
00457       for (int i = 0; i < DimensionSq; ++i) {
00458          elem_[i] -= dt.elem_[i]; 
00459       }
00460    }

00463    * Subtract tensor dt from this tensor.
00464    */
00465    inline
00466    void Tensor::operator-=(const Tensor& dt)
00467    {
00468       for (int i = 0; i < DimensionSq; ++i) {
00469          elem_[i] -= dt.elem_[i]; 
00470       }
00471    }

00474    * Multiply this tensor by scalar s.

00480          elem_[i] *= s;

00495    /*
00496    * Return one element by value.
00497    */
00498    inline
00499    const double& Tensor::operator()(int i, int j) const
00500    {  return elem_[i*Dimension + j]; }

00502    /*
00503    * Return a reference to one element of the tensor.
00504    */
00505    inline
00506    double& Tensor::operator()(int i, int j)
00507    {  return elem_[i*Dimension + j]; }

00509    /*
00510    * Add tensors t1 and t2.
00511    *
00512    * Upon return, *this = t1 + t2.
00513    */
00514    inline
00515    Tensor& Tensor::add(const Tensor& t1, const Tensor& t2)
00516    {
00517       for (int i = 0; i < DimensionSq; ++i) {
00518          elem_[i] = t1.elem_[i] + t2.elem_[i];
00519       }
00520       return *this;
00521    }
00522 
00523    /*
00524    * Subtract tensor t2 from t1.
00525    *
00526    * Upon return, *this = t1 - t2.
00527    */
00528    inline
00529    Tensor& Tensor::subtract(const Tensor& t1, const Tensor& t2)
00530    {
00531       for (int i = 0; i < DimensionSq; ++i) {
00532          elem_[i] = t1.elem_[i] - t2.elem_[i];
00533       }
00534       return *this;
00535    }
00536 
00537    /*
00538    * Multiply a tensor t by a scalar s.
00539    *
00540    * Upon return, *this = t*s.
00541    */
00542    inline
00543    Tensor& Tensor::multiply(const Tensor& t, double s)
00544    {
00545       for (int i = 0; i < DimensionSq; ++i) {
00546          elem_[i] = t.elem_[i]*s;
00547       }
00548       return *this;
00549    }
00550 
00551    /*
00552    * Divide tensor t by scalar s.
00553    *
00554    * Upon return, *this = t/s;
00555    */
00556    inline
00557    Tensor& Tensor::divide(const Tensor& t, double s)
00558    {
00559       for (int i = 0; i < DimensionSq; ++i) {
00560          elem_[i] = t.elem_[i]/s;
00561       }
00562       return *this;
00563    }
00564 
00565    /*
00566    * Return trace of a tensor.
00567    */
00568    inline
00569    double Tensor::trace() const
00570    {
00571       double trace = 0.0;
00572       for (int i = 0; i < Dimension; ++i) {
00573          trace += (*this)(i, i);
00574       }
00575       return trace;
00576    }
00577 
00578    /*
00579    * Compute the transpose of a tensor.
00580    *
00581    * Upon return, this tensor is the transpose of t.
00582    */
00583    inline
00584    Tensor& Tensor::transpose(const Tensor& t)
00585    {
00586       int i, j;
00587       for (i = 0; i < Dimension; ++i) {
00588          (*this)(i, i) = t(i, i);
00589       }
00590       for (i = 1; i < Dimension; ++i) {
00591          for (j = 0; j < i; ++j) {
00592             (*this)(i, j) = t(j, i);  
00593             (*this)(j, i) = t(i, j);
00594          }
00595       }
00596       return *this;
00597    }
00598 
00599    /*
00600    * Transpose this tensor.
00601    *
00602    * Upon return, this tensor is transposed.
00603    */
00604    inline
00605    Tensor& Tensor::transpose()
00606    {
00607       double save;
00608       int i, j;
00609       for (i = 1; i < Dimension; ++i) {
00610          for (j = 0; j < i; ++j) {
00611             save = (*this)(i, j);
00612             (*this)(i, j) = (*this)(j, i);  
00613             (*this)(j, i) = save;
00614          }
00615       }
00616       return *this;
00617    }
00618 
00619    /*
00620    * Compute symmetric part of a tensor.
00621    *
00622    * Upon return, this is symmetric part of t:
00623    * *this = 0.5*(t + t.transpose());
00624    */
00625    inline
00626    Tensor& Tensor::symmetrize(const Tensor& t)
00627    {
00628       double ave;
00629       int i, j;
00630       for (i = 0; i < Dimension; ++i) {
00631          (*this)(i, i) = t(i, i);
00632       }
00633       for (i = 1; i < Dimension; ++i) {
00634          for (j = 0; j < i; ++j) {
00635             ave = 0.5*( t(i, j) + t(j, i) );
00636             (*this)(i, j) = ave;  
00637             (*this)(j, i) = ave;
00638          }
00639       }
00640       return *this;
00641    }
00642 
00643    /*
00644    * Symmetrize this tensor.
00645    *
00646    * Upon return, t is symmetrized:
00647    */
00648    inline
00649    Tensor& Tensor::symmetrize()
00650    {
00651       double ave;
00652       int i, j;
00653       for (i = 1; i < Dimension; ++i) {
00654          for (j = 0; j < i; ++j) {
00655             ave = 0.5*( (*this)(i, j) + (*this)(j, i) );
00656             (*this)(i, j) = ave;  
00657             (*this)(j, i) = ave;
00658          }
00659       }
00660       return *this;
00661    }
00662 
00663    /*
00664    * Serialize to/from an archive.
00665    */
00666    template <class Archive>
00667    inline 
00668    void Tensor::serialize(Archive& ar, const unsigned int version)
00669    { 
00670       for (int i = 0; i < DimensionSq; ++i) {
00671          ar & elem_[i];
00672       }
00673    }

00680 
00681    /*
00682    * Multiply two vectors to create a dyadic tensor.
00683    *
00684    * Upon return, *this = t*s.
00685    */
00686    inline
00687    Tensor& Tensor::dyad(const Vector& v1, const Vector& v2)
00688    {
00689       int i, j;
00690       for (i = 0; i < Dimension; ++i) {
00691          for (j = 0; j < Dimension; ++j) {
00692             elem_[i*Dimension + j] = v1[i]*v2[j];
00693          }
00694       }
00695       return *this;
00696    }
